name: Basketball - Pee Wee
description: Participants will be introduced the basic skills to play basketball, including how to dribble, shoot, and pass. At a young age, many are new to the team concept, so the most important results are to boost self-confidence and to have fun!
fullDescription: Participants will be introduced the basic skills to play basketball, including how to dribble, shoot, and pass. At a young age, many are new to the team concept, so the most important results are to boost self-confidence and to have fun!
whatTheyOffer: Participants will be introduced the basic skills to play basketball, including how to dribble, shoot, and pass. At a young age, many are new to the team concept, so the most important results are to boost self-confidence and to have fun!
howToGetIt: Register online or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900
agency: San Francisco Recreation and Park Department
